channel.title: [HELP]Client!

item.title: [HELP]Client!
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

to remove the Server IP: and Port:, open up Client.java, and search (Ctrl + F) “ip:”, and you should see a code like:

Username:(forgot text as i dont have a client anymore. under all the text you should see:)
j += 15;

Highlight the “Server ip:” and “Port:” code, and delete them so you only see the “Username:” and “Password:” code, save and compile. Then test it out.

To auto connect to your i.p, there is two options.
1.EGUI.java or Gui.java, which ever you have.
2. Client.java

for “1.”, open up EGUI.java or Gui.java, which ever you have, and search “setserver”, or “server” if no results. If there was an i.p already set when you dled the client, search that i.p, and between the two " ", enter your i.p address.

for “2.”, open up Client.java, search the i.p address that was already set when you dled the client if there was one, if not, same thing, search “setserver”, or “server”, until you find the right one. Sorry I could not be exact with information, as I do not have a client anymore lol, and too lazy to download one atm…

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]Client!
item.dc:creator: @bl00d_furyz bl00d furyz
item.description:
@bl00d_furyz wrote:

Hello I have been having problems with my client I want to upgrade and make better! I need to know how to make from a ip changer client like this

username:
password:
server ip:
port:43594

and make it only for my ip adress for my server and have

username:
password:

And another thing I need is a real graphic of dragon claws to add to class 8!

Please and thank you if you decide to give me the infomation![br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2009, 07:53:58 pm[/size][hr]i believe its called the jframe i need to fix[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2009, 08:07:52 pm[/size][hr] aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffFF, "Username: " + aString1173 + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? “@xxx@|” : “”), j);
j += 15;
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Password: " + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? “|” : “”), j);
j += 15;
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? “@xxx@|” : “”), j);
j += 15;
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Port: " + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? “@xxx@|” : “”), j);
j += 15;
if(!flag) {[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2009, 08:08:26 pm[/size][hr]how do u make that just username password and my server ip built in
